channel.title: Before i could use ham now i cant
channel.description:
I have the DHCP traffic in my exceptions tab and i cant configure to the Hamachi adapter.
It says the configuration problem can be caused by my firewall software blockling DHCP traffic on Hamachi apdater. please make sure that UDP Port 67 to 68at 5.0.0.1 are allowed. Alternately you can disable the firewall on Hamachi Adapter
wtf in my network connections i dont see Hamachi adapter

item.title: Before i could use ham now i cant
item.dc:creator: @maxisking maxisking
item.description:
@maxisking wrote:

The firewall IN Hamachi.
Not in network Connections

Read full topic
item.source: Before i could use ham now i cant
